body:
recently me and the clan predator had a discussion on whether division 1 and 2 within clan for scrimmaging and comps

so predators may implement this

other clans too to compete in a comp i will be organising soon if enough clans do this
body_tagged:

so predators may implement this

other clans too to compete in a comp i will be organising soon if enough clans do this
title: division 1 and 2 within clans

replies.body: Why does there need to be this, scrimming isn't really a league and division 2 clans would feel sad, also, are there enough clans to even do this, it would pretty much become the same 2 clans scrimming each other over and over.
replies.body_tagged: Why does there need to be this, scrimming isn't really a league and division 2 clans would feel sad, also, are there enough clans to even do this, it would pretty much become the same 2 clans scrimming each other over and over.

replies.body: I rather scrim the best teams if I am the worst to learn a trick or 2 and use it to my own advantage towards weaker teams
replies.body_tagged: I rather scrim the best teams if I am the worst to learn a trick or 2 and use it to my own advantage towards weaker teams

replies.body: we don't have enough teams for 2 divisions but all my team support this idea
replies.body_tagged: we don't have enough teams for 2 divisions but all my team support this idea

replies.body:
i know what you mean but then it will be a fair scrimmage for division 2 players that they may thrive to become better,


look at it this way, you are in division 2 and seeing this you have to motivation to move up the ranks.

replies.body: we need like a scrimmage server so everyone in the division plays on that server and there is no advantages

replies.body: There's like 6 clans left, what's the point of having 2 divisions for them?

replies.body: Feel free to do whatever you want within your own clan.
